headline: Is Arm & Hammer Owner a Bargain After Recent Share Price Drop in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Church & Dwight's stock is offering good value right now? You are not alone. Many investors are searching for clarity on whether this household products giant is priced right or primed for opportunity. Recently, the share price has bounced around, rising 2.5% in the past week but dropping 1.3% over the last month and down a notable 18.6% year-to-date. This signals some changing sentiment around the stock. Recent headlines highlight Church & Dwight's ongoing investments in brand...
